{"id":937730251,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1682140902,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"152 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/937730251/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Row With Maximum Ones","memory":"60.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> rowAndMaximumOnes(vector<vector<int>>& mat) {\n        vector<int> ans{0,0};\n        for(int i=0;i<mat.size();i++){\n            int count = 0;\n            for(int j=0;j<mat[0].size();j++){\n                if(mat[i][j] == 1) count++;\n            }\n            if(count>ans[1]){\n                ans[0] = i;\n                ans[1] = count;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"row-with-maximum-ones","has_notes":false}
